title: Tough Act to Follow
content: How dominant? They never trailed once in the tournament, outscored their opponents 263, and led for more than 70% of the total time they played. And the only times they were seriously pressed in the tournament, they were only in danger of an equalizer. Not to mention that they took down four top-10 teams in the process (of course, they entered the tournament at #1). One player went so far as to say before the tournament that she felt the US had the two best teamstheir starters and their bench.
